# Introduction To Mangomint

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/introduction-to-mangomint/

## Category
01 Getting Started

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
GETTING STARTED
ABOUT MANGOMINT
Introduction to Mangomint
IN THIS ARTICLE
Video Library
Platform Updates
Mangomint Blog
Contacting Us
Logging in to Mangomint

We offer several ways for you to explore Mangomint, including an on-demand video tour, a live demo, and a free trial. Visit our website and choose how you would like to explore Mangomint.

If you're interested in switching to Mangomint from a previous scheduling software, learn more about our Onboarding team and how they can help you throughout the process of switching.

Link copied
Video Library

In our Video Library, you can watch on-demand videos that cover different Mangomint features in detail.

Link copied
Platform Updates

Our Platform Updates page is an easy way to see what's new in Mangomint, including new features and feature improvements. Updates may include videos, allowing you to easily learn about what’s new in Mangomint.

Once you sign up for a Mangomint account, you can view platform updates directly in your account by selecting What’s New from your profile menu.

You can use the "..." menu to manage your notification preferences and receive push notifications on your mobile device when new features and feature improvements are released.

Link copied
Mangomint Blog

In the Mangomint blog, you can find downloadable templates, real-life examples, business ideas, and other resources to help you make the most of Mangomint.

Link copied
Contacting Us

If you have any questions, send us a message in chat support. You will always receive an answer from a real person on our team.

To use chat support, click the chat bubble next to your profile photo in Mangomint or select Chat Support from your profile menu.

Link copied
Logging in to Mangomint

You can sign in to Mangomint via a web browser or the Mangomint mobile app.

To log in using a web browser, go to https://app.mangomint.com/login.

To log in using the mobile app, download the app from the App Store or Google Play.

Once you're logged in, learn how to set up your account if you're a new Mangomint user.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.

© Mangomint, Inc. All rights reserved.
